description: Demo-only simulator for PMAY housing support, combining transparent rule checks with a simple ML-based approval probability.

benefit_amount.notes: Approximate maximum benefit for housing assistance used only for illustration in this hackathon demo.

fairness_policy.interpretation: In this demo, the difference in approval rates between monitored groups (e.g., male vs female) should not exceed 10 percentage points when averaged over a batch of applications.

ethical_disclaimer: This PMAY module is a hackathon demonstration only. It is NOT an official allocation system and must never be used for real-world eligibility or subsidy decisions. Policy rules are intentionally simplified for educational purposes.
